title: Jugged hare with dumplings
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon sunflower oil', '1 hare, jointed, or 6 hare joints, about 1kg (2lb 4oz) in total', '4 slices of streaky bacon, chopped', '2 onions, chopped', '2 carrots, diced', '2 celery sticks, diced', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', 'Finely grated zest and juice of 1 orange', 'Finely grated zest of ½ unwaxed lemon', '1 sprig each of thyme and marjoram', '3 cloves', '½ teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg', 'Salt and black pepper', '350ml (12fl oz) red wine', 'For the dumplings', '400g (14oz) cold mashed potato', '60g (2¼ oz) plain flour', '35g (1¼ oz) semolina', '4 tablespoons chopped parsley', '1 small egg, beaten', '2 teaspoons cornflour']
